Region Codes

2019-04-25

Source: vignettes/region-codes.Rmd
region-codes.Rmd
library(naturecounts)

In the main data download functions for naturecounts, nc_data_dl() and nc_count(), you have the option of filtering data by region. In this article we will explore the various ways of specifying regional filters.

For more details regarding spatial limits to regions, see the articles:

  • Mapping observations
  • IBAs and BCRs
  • Using spatial data to filter observations

In short

region must be a named list with one of the following:

  • country - Country code (e.g., CA for Canada)
  • statprov - State/province code (e.g., MB for Manitoba)
  • subnational2 - Subnational (type 2) code (e.g., CA.MB.07 for the Brandon Area)
  • iba - Important Bird Areas (IBA) code (e.g., AB001 for Beaverhill Lake in Alberta)
  • bcr - Bird Conservation Regions (e.g., 2 for Western Alaska)
  • utm_squares - UTM square code (e.g., 10UFE96 for a grid in Alberta)
  • bbox - Bounding box coordinates (e.g., c(left = -101.097223, bottom = 50.494717, right = -99.511239, top = 51.027557) for a box containing Riding Mountain National Park in Manitoba)

To use the region argument:

nc_count(region = list(statprov = "NB"))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: statprov (NB)
##       collection nrecords
## 1         ATOWLS      197
## 2            BBS    54578
## 3      BBS50-CAN   141537
## 4            CBC    21559
## 5    EBIRD-CA-AT   889282
## 6  EBIRD-CA-SENS       50
## 7     EBUTTERFLY     2394
## 8           GBBC    13010
## 9           IMQC       11
## 10   MBBA1BE_RAW    73182
## 11  MBBA1BE_SUMM    48406
## 12   MBBA2BE_RAW   123253
## 13  MBBA2BE_SUMM    55195
## 14       MBBA2PC    64492
## 15   MBBA2PC_SAR        7
## 16       MBBA2RC     6908
## 17            MM       42
## 18     NESTWATCH    28864
## 19           PFW   121567
## 20    PRISM-ACSS    42030

In Detail - Codes

Country

Search by name (English or French)

region_search("États-Unis", type = "country")
##   country_code                         country_name                        country_name_fr
## 1           UM United States Minor Outlying Islands Îles mineures éloignées des États-Unis
## 2           US                        United States                             États-Unis
## 3           VI                 Virgin Uslands, U.S.            Îles Vierges des États-Unis

Browse the code list

meta_country_codes()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(country = c("US", "CA")))

State/Province

Search by name (English, French, or Spanish)

region_search("Distrito de Colombia", type = "statprov")
##   country_code statprov_code     statprov_name_es        statprov_name     statprov_name_fr
## 1           US            DC Distrito de Colombia District of Columbia District de Columbia

Browse the code list

meta_statprov_codes()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(statprov = c("DC", "MB")))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: statprov (DC, MB)
##         collection nrecords
## 1       ABBIRDRECS      357
## 2              BBS    86997
## 3        BBS50-CAN   353755
## 4              CBC    29107
## 5    CMMN-DET-DMBO    88280
## 6      EBIRD-CA-PR  1602592
## 7    EBIRD-CA-SENS     2471
## 8       EBUTTERFLY      247
## 9             GBBC    24393
## 10       HAWKCOUNT     1446
## 11            IMQC       26
## 12   MBATLAS1BE_DO    93876
## 13  MBATLAS1BE_RAW   326429
## 14 MBATLAS1BE_SUMM   154856
## 15      MBATLAS1PC   306094
## 16      MBATLAS1RC    15622
## 17          MBOWLS    23561
## 18              MM       53
## 19        MMPBIRDS       60
## 20    MONARCHWATCH       54
## 21       NESTWATCH     4553
## 22       OISEAUXQC        2
## 23             PFW   103573
## 24     PFW-US-EAST     9133

Subnational regions (type 2)

Search by name
Language depends on location: - Mexico = Spanish - USA = English - Quebec = French - Rest of Canada = English

region_search("Montreal", type = "subnational2")
##   country_code statprov_code subnational2_code              subnational2_name ebird_code
## 1           CA            QC          CA.QC.MR Communauté-Urbaine-de-Montréal   CA-QC-MR

Browse the code list

meta_subnational2_codes()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(subnational2 = c("CA-QC-MR", "CA-ON-TO")))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: subnational2 (CA-QC-MR, CA-ON-TO)

Important Bird Areas (IBA)

  • These are Canadian designations

Search by name (English or French)

region_search("oak hammock", type = "iba")
##   iba_site           iba_name_fr latitude statprov area_ha alt_min              iba_name
## 1    MB010 Oak Hammock Marsh WMA 50.18958       MB   67.56     233 Oak Hammock Marsh WMA
##   nearest_town bcr ncc_region alt_max longitude status
## 1     Winnipeg  11         35     233 -97.13287      G

Browse the code list

meta_iba_codes()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(iba = c("MB010", "AB011")))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: iba (IBA.MB010, IBA.AB011)
##         collection nrecords
## 1         ABATLAS1      130
## 2         ABATLAS2       99
## 3       ABBIRDRECS        9
## 4      EBIRD-CA-PR   106688
## 5    EBIRD-CA-SENS       37
## 6       EBUTTERFLY        3
## 7    MBATLAS1BE_DO      309
## 8   MBATLAS1BE_RAW     1004
## 9  MBATLAS1BE_SUMM      208
## 10      MBATLAS1PC      381
## 11      MBATLAS1RC       23
## 12       NESTWATCH        2

Bird Conservation Regions (BCR)

Search by name (English, French, or Spanish)

region_search("rainforest", type = "bcr")
##   bcr                    bcr_name                        bcr_name_es
## 1   5 Northern Pacific Rainforest Bosque Lluvioso del Pacífico Norte
##                                        bcr_name_fr
## 1 Forêts pluviales du nord de la côte du Pacifique

Browse the code list

meta_bcr_codes()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(bcr = c(5, 2)))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: bcr (BCR.05, BCR.02)
##         collection nrecords
## 1        BBS50-CAN   100890
## 2    BBS50-US-WEST   654441
## 3    BCATLAS1BE_DO     8171
## 4   BCATLAS1BE_RAW    84685
## 5  BCATLAS1BE_SUMM    35528
## 6       BCATLAS1PC    52256
## 7       BCATLAS1RC     6309
## 8          BCBEACH     6576
## 9            BCCWS   328950
## 10            BCMA     4286
## 11          BCOWLS     6248
## 12       BIRDSOFBC   250134
## 13             CBC   421925
## 14   CMMN-DET-RPBO   131972
## 15     EBIRD-CA-BC  6950444
## 16     EBIRD-CA-NO       18
## 17   EBIRD-CA-SENS     1463
## 18      EBUTTERFLY      344
## 19            GBBC    71691
## 20       HAWKCOUNT      249

## 25     PFW-US-WEST   648740

## 27      WRNIGHTJAR      519

UTM Squares

Browse the code list

meta_utm_squares()

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(utm_squares = "18TUR35"))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: utm_squares (18TUR35)
##      collection nrecords
## 1   EBIRD-CA-ON    10158
## 2      MMPFROGS       37
## 3     NESTWATCH       65
## 4   OBBA1BE_RAW      178
## 5  OBBA1BE_SUMM      103
## 6   OBBA2BE_RAW      232
## 7  OBBA2BE_SUMM       96
## 8       OBBA2PC      205
## 9       OBBA2RC       10
## 10  RCBIOTABASE     1916
## 11         WPWI       10

Bounding Box

Bounding box reflects latitude and longitude limits.

Use the resulting code(s)

nc_count(region = list(bbox = c(left = -125, bottom = 45, 
                                right = -100, top = 50)))
## Without a username, using 'show = "all"'
## Using filters: bbox_left (-125); bbox_bottom (45); bbox_right (-100); bbox_top (50)
##         collection nrecords
## 1         ABATLAS1     9827
## 2         ABATLAS2    25652
## 3       ABBIRDRECS    39546
## 4              BBS   373698
## 5        BBS50-CAN   298454
